basics.name: Adam Joseph Parrilla
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am currently studying for a B.A. in Information & Computer Science and Art Studio, and a Certificate in Creative Computational Media at the University of Hawaii at Manoa

education.area: Information & Computer Science and Art Studio, Creative Computational Media (expected Fall, 2023)

work.company: US Army: 25th Combat Aviation Brigade Hawai'i
work.summary: Capstone project working with sponsor Major Curtis Bew to create a Scheduler interface for aircraft
highlights: Javascript, HTML/CSS, and Bootstrap-React experience
Writing development for project posters and presentations
Collaborative work with fellow students
Gain experience with schedulers and it as an interface
Work on UX design of scheduler
Learn what its like professionally working with the military

work.company: University of Hawaii at Manoa: Hamilton Library
highlights: Learn more about writer & artist Edward Gorey
Writing skills development
Independent and group collaborative work
Gain experience with library database
Work on UX design for web exhibit
Create physical art exhibit
Evaluating and inspecting artwork
Trained to move and handle the artwork
Gaining experience dealing with works of art
Learn to provide customer service
Assist customers and work in a collective group
Gaining work experience while funding my future projects

volunteer.organization: Hawaiians in Technology & Purple Maiʻa Hackathon 2022
volunteer.summary: Joined to learn and help fellow Hawaiians in Technology
highlights: Learned about Moʻokūʻauhau and geneology through developing software
Helped communicate ideas between one another
Culturally root Hawaiians in Computer Science

volunteer.summary: Summer symposium to present our Gorey research project
highlights: Worked on communication and presentation skills
Organized and designed a poster to present our information
Collaboration was an important key to our success
Worked with students to use Math programs
Helped communicate problems and solve issues
Set up applications for kids

volunteer.summary: Volunteered at the Lo'i patch during high school
highlights: Hawaiian culture
Learning about the land

awards.title: CNS Native Hawaiian Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship is awarded to Native Hawaiians that are Information & Computer Science majors that have above a minimum of 3.0 GPA.

awards.title: Mari Tudor Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship is awarded to students majoring in Art that submit two pieces of their artwork.

awards.title: ASUH Scholarship: Academic Achievement
awards.summary: Scholarship is awarded to UH Manoa fulltime students with a cumulative GPA above 3.5

awards.title: Manoa Service Learning Award
awards.summary: Scholarship is awarded to students based on financial need and availability. Requires 50 hours of community service.

awards.title: Kua'ana Tuition Waiver
awards.summary: The Kuaʻana Tuition Waiver is a financial need-based waiver for Native Hawaiian students enrolled at UH Mānoa.

awards.title: Manoa Opportunity Grant
awards.summary: Scholarship is awarded to students who demonstrate financial need based on information provided on your FAFSA.

awards.title: Summer Success Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship is awarded to sophomores that have above a minimum of 3.5 GPA and be registered for at least 3 summer credits.

awards.title: Deans List
awards.summary: Made the Dean's list for earning a GPA of above 3.5 while taking 12 or more credits.
